menu.title: General Menu
menu.message:
In this menu that opens at startup, all your galleries are displayed.
You can add a gallery by clicking on the last image in the list. You will then be redirected to the image adding menu.
You can also click on an image to go to the corresponding gallery.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.message:
In this menu, all the images of the gallery are displayed, divided into the left and right sides of the tramway.
You can add an image to this gallery by clicking on the button in the top left, next to the text field to edit the gallery name.
You can also edit an image by clicking on it.

add_image.title: Add Image
add_image.message:
This menu allows you to add a new image to a new or existing gallery.
After loading the image, you can select the side and category of the image, and whether it is the new cover of the gallery. If it is a new gallery, you must enter its name in the corresponding text field.

choice_side.title: Side Selection
choice_side.message: Using these buttons, you can choose the side of the tramway visible in the photo.

choice_category.title: Category Selection
choice_category.message: Using these buttons, you can choose the category that represents the quality of the image.

default.title: Cover Definition
default.message: Using this button, you can choose whether the new image will be the cover of this gallery in the collection menu.

edit_image.title: Image Editing
edit_image.message:
This menu has the same features as the image adding menu, except that the user can delete the image in question.
A confirmation window will appear, and once validated, this action will be irreversible.

collection.title: Collection
collection.message:
In the collection menu, reachable by clicking on the book in the main menu, you can see the progress of your collection with the images set as covers for each side of each gallery.
You can also access the image adding menu from this menu by clicking on the corresponding buttons.

settings.title: Settings
settings.message:
You can access the settings menu by clicking on the gear icon in the main menu.
Here, you can change the language of the application, view the statistics of your collection, and consult this tutorial.
You can also import a collection or share the current one. Please note that when importing a new collection, the current one will be deleted.
